text: Defence of Sevastopol () is a 1911 Russian silent movie directed by Vasili Goncharov and Aleksandr Khanzhonkov.Пионер русского кино Ханжонков и главный дореволюционный фильм It stars A. Bibikov, Pavel Biryukov, and B. Borisov. ==Actors== * A. Bibikov – Eduard Totleben * Pavel Biryukov * B. Borisov * Aleksandra Goncharova * Borus Gorin-Goryainov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:1911 movies Category:Movies directed by Vasili Goncharov
title: Defence of Sevastopol
